title: Mom Made Us Write This In The Summer
description: A sister and brother, forced to write in the summer, and share ONE journal? Ugh.This is exactly what happens to 10-year-old twins Maggie and Max Pruitt. When Mom comes up with a plan for them to keep a summer journal, Maggie and Max can’t believe it. Worse yet, they have to share! Through their writing, Maggie and Max find out they have very different (and hilarious) views about growing up, family and life – a conclusion they only discovered because, as Max and Maggie say, “Mom Made Us Write This.”Positive, creative and fun for classrooms and families! -Mrs. Jane Jagielo, 4th Grade Teacher
author: Ali Maier
